content.text: Having dealt with all the questions on your mind, you step aside as Kozlov moves past you to pick his pack up off some dusty couch in the corner.
"Now then," he clicks his tongue, "Let's get some action. Kasha, you good to go?" He spares the dark-haired woman a glance.
"Whatever," she grunts, hopping off the couch to her feed with a loud thud and wrestling her own pack out from behind the couch.
Volkhov looks at everyone and gives a plain-old thumbs up. "Don't have too much fun, guys." He's back sticking his nose into strange dinged-up items a moment later.
You notice the blonde woman - Klava? - smiling and waving from the doorway, but she's gone as quickly as she arrived.
